actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To provide for supplemental appropriations for obesity programs of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and for other purposes.
subjects: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Makes: (1) emergency supplemental appropriations for obesity programs of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and (2) offsetting rescissions of prior year unobligated balances of specified accounts.

titles.title: To provide for supplemental appropriations for obesity programs of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and for other purposes.
